description:
The Amazonians chasing Luffy are loyal subjects of Boa Hancock, the curvaceous Warlord of the Sea. This stone-cold beauty is deadly, and she’s about to pick a fight with an entire fleet of marines!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Everyone Falls in Love! Pirate Empress Hancock
Tout le monde en est amoureux ! Hancock, l`impératrice pirate
يقع الجميع في الحبّ! الإمبراطورة القرصانة هانكوك!
みんなメロメロ! 海賊女帝ハンコック
